arabic_text: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ
translation: (53) And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault[1241] the unseen from a place far away.[1242]
footnotes:
[1241]- Verbally, by conjecture and denial.
[1242]- i.e., a position far from truth.
